data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kistenich, Sonja, Bendiksby, Mika, Vairappan, Charles S., Weerakoon, Gothamie, Wijesundara, Siril, Wolseley, Patricia A., Timdal, Einar (2019): A regional study of the genus Phyllopsora (Ramalinaceae) in Asia and Melanesia. MycoKeys 53: 23-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.53.33425, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.53.33425
